---EXAMPLE
- A @Alice #urgent "Fix authentication bug" due: 2025-10-01 weight: 10
---FOUND
`@Alice` color is white
---EXPECTED
`@Alice` color is yellow
---

---EXAMPLE
- A @Alice #urgent "Fix authentication bug" due: 2025-10-01 weight: 10
---FOUND
`due` is blue (good)
`weight` is not blue (bad)
---EXPECTED
`due` is blue
`weight` is blue
---

---EXAMPLE
- A @Alice #urgent "Fix authentication bug" due: 2025-10-01 weight: 10
---FOUND
`urgent` is blue
---EXPECTED
`#urgent` is blue
---
